https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bKoVhgVwcyKAwiu20cgSFGxlNjd.jpg An intrepid team of 300 scientists spend a year in harsh conditions deep in the Arctic, on a pioneering expedition to secure vital answers to help us deal with climate change. A Year in the Ice: The Arctic Drift
